scripts.process-images:portfolio-all: node scripts/process-images.js portfolio-logos && node scripts/process-images.js portfolio-business-card && node scripts/process-images.js portfolio-id-cards && node scripts/process-images.js portfolio-brochure-cover && node scripts/process-images.js portfolio-posters && node scripts/process-images.js portfolio-packaging && node scripts/process-images.js portfolio-social-media-posts && node scripts/process-images.js portfolio-backdrop && node scripts/process-images.js portfolio-magazine-ad
